body_html: Oh, sorry. I'm afraid it's not a solution at this point. I'm thinking that we should maybe change all optimizers in TensorFlow to use get_variable instead of just Variable. But that's a big change, needs to be discussed a bit more. I see no trivial hack around this at present, sorry. (Except if you patch your own TensorFlow and change both calls to tf.Variable in AdamOptimizer to corresponding calls of tf.get_variable.)
